name: Trident Capital
overview: Trident Capital is a venture capital firm focused on software and technology enabled business services. They are headquartered in Palo Alto, California. Their sectors of investment range from Internet and Enterprise Software to Healthcare and Insurance Services across all stages of the investing lifecycle.
